post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
J2EE Web Developer – 4 month contract
I was reviewing your resume and wanted to know if you are interested in a 4 month contract as a J2EE Web Developer.  
Qualified candidates should forward their resume in WORD DOCUMENT FORMAT, with their name and the position they are applying for in the subject line of their email, to: abby.cheung@cryptologic.com.

In your reply you must indicate:
•    Hourly rate
•    Availability
•    Review our website www.cryptologic.com to understand our industry and location
•    You are able to complete a technical test
•    Numbers of years and which company you have been responsible for OOAD and web-based programming using Java and J2EE to build large-scale applications in an enterprise environment
•    Number of years and which company you worked in EJB, JSP, Servlets, STRUTS, Ant, JBuilder
•    Number of years and which company you worked in UML
•    Number of years and which company you worked in XML, SOAP
•    SUN Certified accreditation is a definite asset
•    Experience working with Internet based payment solutions an asset

POSITION SUMMARY:
CryptoLogic Inc. is looking for an outstanding Web Developer who will play a major role in the development, maintenance, and deployment of the Company’s many exciting web-based solutions.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:    
Reporting to the Team Lead of Web Services, this demanding role requires strong Java and J2EE skills developing seamless web-based applications. The ideal candidate should have demonstrable project experience working with these technologies combined with exceptional oral and written communication skills.

QUALIFICATIONS:
•    Minimum of 5 years of OOAD and web-based programming experience using Java and J2EE to build large-scale applications in an enterprise environment.
•    Proven hands-on experience with J2EE, JSP, Struts, Jakarta Commons, Hibernate, Spring, and Web Services
•    Solid understanding of SOA.
•    Good working knowledge of UML, object modeling, analysis and design patterns.
•    Excellent written and verbal communication skills are required.
•    Strong focus on teamwork and achieving team goals.
•    Entrepreneurial, creative, resourceful, insightful, self-motivated and self-confident.


abby.cheung@cryptologic.com
post.title: Java Web Developer
